mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_INFO (USER_ID, USER_NAME, PASSWORD, EMAIL, ADDR1, ADDR2, REG_ID, REG_DT, CHG_ID, CHG_DT) VALUES (#{userId}, #{userName}, #{password}, #{email}, #{addr1}, #{addr2}, #{userId}, NOW(), #{userId}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID as userId, USER_NAME as userName, EMAIL as email, ADDR1 as addr1, ADDR2 as addr2 FROM USER_INFO WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.update: UPDATE USER_INFO SET USER_NAME = #{userName}, ADDR1 = #{addr1}, ADDR2 = #{addr2}, CHG_ID = #{userId}, CHG_DT = NOW() WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
UPDATE USER_INFO SET EMAIL = #{email}, CHG_ID = #{userId}, CHG_DT = NOW() WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
